title: Web Search (Serp)

openaiSpec.name: search_web
openaiSpec.description: Search the web using SERP API (Google search engine)

userSettings.name: serpAPIKey
userSettings.label: Serp API Key
userSettings.description: Enter your Serp API Key here, if you don't have one, sign up from serpapi.com

overviewMarkdown:
## Web Search (SerpApi)

This plugin allows the AI assistant to search for information from the internet in real-time using Google Search.

**ðŸ”‘ Serp API Key needed**. Click the Settings tab and enter your Serp API Key. To get your API Key, [create a Serp account](https://serpapi.com/)

Example usage:

> What's the gold price today?

> How's the weather in SF at the moment?
